title: Courgette chutney
ingredients: ['1kg courgette', '1 tart apple, peeled and cored', '1 medium onion', '1 green pepper', '1 garlic clove, minced', '250g dark brown soft sugar', '250ml white wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon grated fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon English mustard', '1/4 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
